abstract: SAC Capital Advisors told investors it had received a so-called Wells notice from the Securities and Exchange Commission, an indication the agency was considering an enforcement action against the hedge fund.
snippet: SAC Capital Advisors told investors it had received a so-called Wells notice from the Securities and Exchange Commission, an indication the agency was considering an enforcement action against the hedge fund.

headline.main: S.E.C. Weighs Suit Against SAC Capital
headline.print_headline: Insider Inquiry Pushes Recluse Into Public Eye
